#id=1
#text=A bath is an excellent way to relieve stress in your life .
#id=2
#text=It 's a very simple process and recommended only if you have some time to yourself .
#id=3
#text=Make sure to let everyone know that you are going to take a bath , and not to bother you .
#id=4
#text=This works out much better if you are home alone .
#id=5
#text=Head into your bathroom , and set the tub up to stop the water from draining .
#id=6
#text=Turn the hot water on and let the tub fill up .
#id=7
#text=If you would rather a cold bath then maybe a bath is n't the best choice for you .
#id=8
#text=While the water is running make yourself a nice drink but if you are underage then sparkling grape juice works great .
#id=9
#text=You can also light a candle and bring it in with you .
#text=Once the tub is full enter the tub and immediately feel the stress levels dropping .
#text=Once you have determined you are finished you can pull the plug and watch the water and your problems drain away !
